plain_text:
United States Court of Appeals
                     For the First Circuit
                      ____________________
No. 01-2353

                          PAUL GUNTER,
                      Petitioner, Appellee,

                               v.

                       MICHAEL T. MALONEY,

                     Respondent, Appellant.
                      ____________________


                          ERRATA SHEET

          The opinion of this court, issued April 29, 2002,
should be amended as follows:
page 5, line 14:      replace "and" with ". . ."
page 16, line 19:     add "1st Cir." before "1995"
